title: For You
lyrics:
When you're feeling sad
When you're feeling blue
When you just cannot
Seem to get your day through
And you're just so sick of it

Underestimated, discriminated

When the whole world

Seem to be against you

Trust me, you're not alone



When you feel so inadequate

And you just wanna quit everything

When you feel like you've had enough

And out of love

But you need love



Know that you are everything

My everything to me

Why can't you see

That you have the perfect smile

Makes me happy for awhile

And no one else could

Do that But you you you

Do that But you you you

Do that But you



No matter what they say

What they say

You are perfect to me



When you feel so inadequate

You just wanna quit everything

When you feel like you've had enough

And out of love

But you need love



Know that you are everything

My everything to me

Why can't you see

That you have the perfect smile

Makes me happy for awhile

And no one else could do that



But, You are my everything

My everything to me

Why can't you see

That you have the perfect smile

Makes me happy for awhile

And no one else could do that

But you you you



It’s you, you, you

It’s you, you, you

It’s you, you



You are perfect to me
